name: Retro Racing (itch)
description: Do you think you can defeat all 3 tracks before time runs out? Prove it in this free arcade style game. Retro Racing. In this top down view game, you got to go through 8 laps on 3 different stages, dirt, turf and ice. If you like games like Daytona USA, Sega Rally,  Ridge Racer, Crusin and other classic arcade style racer, you should try this out. After all, its free. If you got any suggestions and ideas, feel free to let me know. I am new at game dev and it would be great to support indie developers.
